itinerary.mapNote: Steep ascent through cloud forest and páramo. 3600m.
Pre-dawn summit push. Fuego eruption views. Descent. 2400m.

waypoints.name: Acatenango Summit
waypoints.note: Pre-dawn summit. Guatemala City lights and Fuego lava show below.

waypoints.name: Fuego Volcano
waypoints.note: One of world's most active volcanoes. Continuous eruptions visible.

waypoints.name: Fuego Eruption Viewpoint
waypoints.note: Ridge between peaks. Close-range lava fountains at night.

waypoints.name: Antigua Guatemala
waypoints.note: Colonial UNESCO city. Trail gateway. Spanish colonial architecture.
